items.title: Canon EOS R8
items.description: A lightweight, travel-friendly, full-frame camera body, the Canon EOS R8 Mirrorless Camera offers powerful photo and video capabilities for both photographers and multimedia content creators. Utilising a newly developed sensor, the R8 features a 24.2MP CMOS sensor paired with a DIGIC X processor. Together, this combination provides outstanding stills performance, impressive 4K 60p 10-bit video, and fast auto focus. A perfect choice for low-light portrait photography and wide, expansive landscapes.

properties.value: Dual Pixel CMOS AF II (1,053 AF points)

items.title: Canon RF 24-240mm F4-6.3 IS USM
items.description: A portable, versatile 10x zoom lens for the EOS R system that‚Äôs ideal for everything from wide-angle landscapes to frame-filling portraits, and even close-up sport and wildlife. At just 750g, it's ideal for the travelling photographer. Built-in Image Stabilizer technology allows for hand-held shooting at shutter speeds up to 5 stops. Shoot everything with a single lens, from big landscapes to powerful portraits and frame-filling action shots.

properties.value: Up to 5 stops of Optical IS

items.title: K&F Concept 72MM UV Filter Nano-K MCUV
items.description: An ultra-slim, multi-coated UV filter with Japanese optical glass for clarity and protection. Nano-coating reduces reflections and glare, while the scratch-resistant, waterproof design ensures durability. The slim aluminum frame prevents vignetting.

items.title: Canon EW-78F Lens Hood
items.description: A lightweight, petal-shaped lens hood designed to reduce flare, enhance contrast, and protect the lens from bumps and scratches. Features a secure bayonet mount for easy attachment.

items.title: Canon RF 50mm F1.8 STM
items.description: A lightweight, petal-shaped lens hood designed to reduce flare, enhance contrast, and protect the lens from bumps and scratches. Features a secure bayonet mount for easy attachment.

properties.value: f/1.8 (wide aperture for low-light and bokeh)

items.title: K&F Concept 43mm UV Filter Nano-K MCUV
items.description: A multi-coated UV filter with Japanese optical glass for clarity and protection. Shields the lens from scratches, dust, and moisture with a lightweight aluminum frame to prevent vignetting.

items.title: llano LP-E17 18W Charger + 2x Battery
items.description: Employing 18W QC3.0 and PD3.0 technology. Capable of charging two batteries simultaneously or independently with a single USB-C port.

items.title: Kingston 64GB SDXC UHS-II U3 V90
items.description: High-speed SD card for professional 4K/8K recording and continuous shooting, ensuring smooth performance and durability.

items.description: Ideal for burst photography, and reliable backup in tough conditions.

items.title: Apple USB-C to SD Card Reader
items.description: Transfers photos and videos at UHS-II speeds to USB-C-enabled Mac, iPad or iPhone

items.title: 2-in-1 Invisible Selfie Stick + Tripod
items.description: Foldable 2-in-1 selfie stick and tripod with a 1/4 standard screw.

items.title: CAMOLO Metal Phone Holder
items.description: High-quality metal phone tripod mount with 360¬∞ rotation, 135¬∞ tilt, Arca Swiss compatibility, and four cold shoes. Supports multiple accessories for vlogging, live streaming, and photography. Perfect for mounting a phone on top of a camera for recording.

items.title: NEEWER Z2-C 2600mAh Battery TTL Round Head
items.description: Powerful speedlight with enhanced UI, instant TTL/M mode switch, and 2.4G wireless control. Features 76Ws output, adjustable LED modeling lamps, and flexible bounce angles.

items.title: NEEWER CB300B 320W LED Video Light
items.description: with 2.4G/APP Remote Control, All Metal Bi Color COB Continuous Output Lighting with Bowens Mount 150000lux/1m 2700K-6500K CRI/TLCI97+ 12 Effects for Video. Suitable as a key light for vivid, attractive camera photo shooting with 28db ultra-low noise.

items.title: Godox LITEMONS LED 6R RGB
items.description: Compact and lightweight RGB light with adjustable color temperature for accurate colors. Perfect for photography, videography, and creative lighting effects, with 2‚Äì10 hours of runtime on a single charge!

items.title: NEEWER 85cm Softbox Parabolic Hexadecagon
items.description: Hexadecagon parabolic softbox collapsible beauty dish features an opening size of 85 x 39cm, quick setup, and foldable design. Features dual diffusers, a honeycomb grid for directional light, and durable 16-rib construction with carry bag.

items.title: NEEWER 2 Pack Air Cushioned Aluminum Light Stand 3m with Boom Arm
items.description: Versatile 3m air-cushioned light stand with a 1.55m extendable boom arm, 5kg load capacity, and sturdy metal build. Includes 1kg counterweight and sandbag for extra stability. Adjustable height and arm length with a 1/4"-3/8" screw adapter for compatibility with various photography gear. Ideal for indoor and outdoor use.

items.title: NEEWER NK-ST300 10x8ft Backdrop Stand
items.description: NEEWER Backdrop Stand Heavy Duty with Widened Bases, 10x8ft Background Stand with 4 Crossbars, 2 Telescopic Poles, 4 Spring Clips, and Carrying Bag. With four detachable crossbars (two upper, two lower) and two telescopic extension poles, this adjustable backdrop stand easily adjust width from 5.9ft/180cm to 9.8ft/300cm by adding or removing crossbars, and set at your preferred height from 3.2ft/98cm to 8ft/245cm with a simple twist

items.title: Neewer 10x20FT Collapsible White Backdrop Background
items.description: PRO Photo Studio 100% Pure Polyester Collapsible Backdrop Background. Durable and anti-wrinkle in single piece seamless design with consistent white color. Made of 100% pure muslin.

items.title: Canon Zoemini 2
items.description: Pocket-sized, ink-free and ready to print your photos anytime, anywhere ‚Äì it‚Äôs the perfect partner for your smartphone. Ink-free, wireless and small enough to slip in your pocket, Canon Zoemini 2 is the rechargeable photo printer that‚Äôs always with you when you need it. Snap and personalise photos on your mobile device, then get instant peel-and-stick prints. Wherever you are, this pocket-sized printer turns your smartphone snaps into beautiful photos.

items.title: Canon SELPHY CP1500
items.description: A compact and wireless photo printer delivering high-quality, durable prints in seconds.

items.title: DuraPro 1Pc 2000mAh Battery + Charger
items.description: Battery and charger for Canon SELPHY CP series printers, providing portable power for on-the-go printing.

items.title: Insta360 GO 3S
items.description: Tiny 4K camera for hands-free POV & Action Pod for remote control & live preview. Small camera, huge potential. Go completely hands-free and live in the moment! Set it and forget about it for easy, ultra-wide POV shots.

items.title: Anker Prime 27,650mAh Power Bank (250W)
items.description: The power bank combines ultra-compact dynamic power, maximum charging speed for every port, the advanced ActiveShield‚Ñ¢ 2.0 safety system, unparalleled compatibility, and Power Delivery 3.1 technology, ensuring efficient and secure charging for all your devices. Powered by the latest PD 3.1 technology, the power bank comes with 2 USB-C ports and 1 USB-A port to deliver up to 250W of power. The power bank is the size of a soda can with a capacity of 27,650mAh and can charge an iPhone 15 approximately 4 times. This power bank is 99.54Wh, which meets the requirements of the TSA (less than 100Wh) to be taken on airplanes as carry-on baggage.

properties.value: Meets TSA regulations (under 100Wh) for carry-on luggage.

items.title: TARION Leather Camera Backpack Waterproof
items.description: Camera Bag with Side Access IPX5 Waterproof Camera Rucksack with Rain Cover RB02. 17L with dedicated space for a 15inch laptop, tripod and adjustable inner EPE dividers
